item.title: Is this coded in delta?
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

Well,
As i thought for my Christmas event, is this in the NPChandler?
How can i put this in the NPCHandler.java
Cant find the

client c

Check this outâ€¦

if (npcs[i].npcType == 145 ) { client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; temp.toX = 2240; temp.toY = 3231; c.Gift = 2; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1558 ) { client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; temp.toX = 3031; temp.toY = 9544; c.Gift = 3; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1563 ) { client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; temp.toX = 2852; temp.toY = 3806; c.Gift = 4; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 795 ) { client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; temp.toX = 3086; temp.toY = 3493; c.Gift = 6; c.xmasreward(); }

Hmm,
Where shall i put it?
